::Zardus/Mosquitor::

Zardus ducks out of the way, firing two more missiles at Aelo. His other hand pulls up a rifle, launching several bolts at her.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor's insect legs clamp around Celeno as he lands on her, shots hitting him but being mostly ignored. With a wild buzz, he lifts his head back and slams his mouthpieced (the thing that mosquitos suck people's blood with) into her back (I'm assuming. Its up to you to post damage for that, Airly). As soon as the mouthpiece would be in, spikes would deploy to hold it in place. Two of Mosquitor's legs push against the ground, launching him and Celeno up, his wings vibrating wildly to lift them off the ground.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::
>

> 10 against Wheeljack. She always had been 
>

> dificultly she could fight against Mosquitor, although she felt pain 
> and she was stun by WheelJack and Hurrican's attack, she continued 
> fightting, and fired 3 energy-balls against Mosquitor.
> 
> Ocipite had the best luck of all, she always had been the agilest of 
> the three sisters. She avoided Hurricane's attack most of Wheeljack's 
> shots, just 2 shots hit her in one of her wings but she was decided 
> to win she fired 10 energy balls against  Wheeljack, 10 against 
> Hurricane and 5 against Mosquitor
>
